title: Summer Activities?
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Honoka, what are you writing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Oh, hey, Nico-chan! I’m uh, writing down the things I wanna do this summer~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Hm, let’s see, summer festival, fireworks, swimming pool, camping, nagashi somen, BBQ......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Y-You’re planning on doing all of this!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yup! Nico-chan, is there something else you want to do?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Me? Hmm, I think watermelon splitting would be fun.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Watermelon splitting! That’s perfect for summer! And we can go to the beach with everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Watermelon splitting at the beach is definitely something to look for.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Alright then, let’s go and tell the others now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>It seems like we’ll make tons of fun memories again this summer!I<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
